content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction area at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Beltgroup (position y) that connects the burner mining drill to the furnace at position x

### Iron gear wheel crafting area
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) that requires 2 iron plates and 1 iron gear wheel
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For instance, you need 2 iron plates to craft an iron gear wheel. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors when using crafting machines without the required inputs
- Verify that the necessary ingredients are available in the inventory or in connected entities before crafting.
